summary:
Makes Tavern Girls more modest by replacing their clothes with the barkeep clothes.
THIS MOD HAS BEEN UPDATED/REPLACED. USE MY \"Skyrim Modesty Mod\" INSTEAD. Thanks.
Skyrim Modesty Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23230
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/IceburgModding][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15827-1-1349192119.png[/img][/url][/center]
Makes Tavern Girls more modest by replacing their clothes with the barkeep clothes.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23230]************************WARNING: THIS MOD HAS BEEN UPDATED/REPLACED. USE MY \"Skyrim Modesty Mod\" INSTEAD. Thanks.************************[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23230]Skyrim Modesty Mod[/url] edits both the skinny and fat versions of 15 female amours. That\'s 30 meshes designed to make Skyrim a more modest country. 
Unlike other modesty mods that simply replace immodest armors with modest ones, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23230]Skyrim Modesty Mod[/url] tweaks each armor so that you can enjoy a more modest Skyrim, while maintaining all of its original diversity.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002745[/img]
Copy the \'Data\' folder over into your Skyrim folder (where your exe is).
[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002750[/img]
Go to the Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\clothing\\wench folder and delete the wenchoutfit_0 and wenchoutfit_1 .nif files.
[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002746[/img]
If you don\'t like this mod due to your personal taste, please don\'t comment.
Thanks!
author: Iceburg
